title: MacBook Pro M3
description: Experience unparalleled performance with the revolutionary M3 chip, featuring a 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display and up to 64GB of unified memory.

title: MacBook Air M2
description: Lightweight and powerful with the M2 chip, featuring a 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display and up to 24GB of unified memory for all-day productivity.

title: Inspiron 16 Plus
description: A powerhouse for productivity and multimedia with 11th Gen Intel Core processors, a 16-inch 3K display, and NVIDIA GeForce graphics.

title: Latitude 9440 2-in-1
description: Flexibility meets performance with this 2-in-1 laptop, featuring a 14-inch FHD+ touch display, Intel Iris Xe Graphics, and Wi-Fi 6E.

title: Dell XPS 17
description: Maximize your creativity and productivity with the XPS 17, featuring up to 11th Gen Intel Core i9 processors, a 17-inch UHD+ touch display, and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics.

title: Dell XPS 18
description: Maximize your creativity and productivity with the XPS 17, featuring up to 11th Gen Intel Core i9 processors, a 17-inch UHD+ touch display, and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics.
